website_summaries.verdict: Whether your pet has a penchant for peeing on couches, carpets, hard floors, or beds, this scented urine eliminator is gentle on surfaces and tough on odors. Highly effective at removing both odors and stains.
pros: Enzymatic cleaning action breaks down bacteria to completely remove urine odors rather than simply masking them
Discourages dogs from returning to problem areas
cons: Not suitable for hardwood, leather, and suede materials

customer_reviews.title: Works way better than expected ..
customer_reviews.text: I had one puppy that was tinkling on the carpet. I lightly sprayed it all over my carpet and she is now going on her puppy pads. There is no lingering smell. My 5 year old dog has always incisively licking the carpet and the vet said it was anxiety and prescribed expensive anxiety medication. He no longer licks the carpet. We had tried everything imaginable to get him to stop this. This took care of both problems. I am going to add some of this to my carpet shampoo when I clean the carpet. I'm so happy I have found this easy solution to both problems.
customer_reviews.author: Catzie

customer_reviews.title: Alright, but there are better products out there.
customer_reviews.text: This does eliminate the smell of dog pee (it smells like lavender) which I like, but it does not act as a deterrent.. my dog continually pees in the same spots, but he doesn’t like the spray when I spray it initially.. so the scent doesn’t last. Also I wouldn’t consider it the best stain remover & the nozzle doesn’t spray well AT ALL which is really annoying. I think that there’s better products out there but this one isn’t a bad option.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 male dogs that constantly mark over each other, especially on the pool table legs. NOT ANY MORE!!!! No stinky pool table legs in over a month. Nature's Miracle has stopped this behavior while doing NO damage to the furniture finish. Awesome product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Crosland

customer_reviews.title: Highly effective, with a great and natural scent
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many "no marking" products before to no avail. This was my last hope in terms of making sure my pups were going in the right place. Nature's Miracle No More Marking is the ONLY product I have tried that actually works - and it has a wonderful and natural scent that is not 'chemical-ly' smelling. I absolutely love this product and will be buying more to make sure my doxie's go on the pads, and not the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Haber

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work as far as preventing my dog from "marking" in the same spots once I spray the area. Only problem is he just moves on to other spots. lol I guess I have to put it on all my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Kahl

customer_reviews.title: Not effective, but a guarantee that it works, so I am holding them to that and returning it
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing, as in zero, after 3 weeks of diligent use and training, my male Bichon pup of 6 months old, was not impressed at all. He peed on the Nature’s Miracle spot more frequently than any other. Has a strong, not pleasant or not horrible odor. The price is half that of stores. But what good is paying less money for an ineffective product? My Vet even said after a few weeks that this companies products are not very good and they have been selling them for decades. He hasn’t heard of a positive result ever.
customer_reviews.author: KennyMac

customer_reviews.title: Smell you later ! Or maybe not?!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scent and spray atomizer. Works great on all surfaces, even general stains from other things. I've used it on my rugs, couches, and clothes. Covers up the smell, and eliminates the stain. Pee, poop, blood, dirt, and food stains. Eliminates them all.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I heard great things about Nature's Miracle but it just didn't work. We attempted to break our 9 year old Shih Tzu of using a pee pad in the same location by taking it away and saturating the carpet and floor with this product as well as Nature's Miracle Pet Block, but he is either very set in his ways or immune to the smell of the products, because they did not stop him from peeing there. Fortunately, we're about to get a puppy so we can keep using the products. If they don't work, I will ask the company for refunds.
customer_reviews.author: Bacony

customer_reviews.title: My pet still marks
customer_reviews.text: This cleans well, but my dog continues to mark in the places where this product has been sprayed. False advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Sara_marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for kitty "accidents."
customer_reviews.text: Nature's Miracle ALWAYS works thank goodness. We recently moved with our five kitty cats. As piles of laundry were put on the laundry room floor to be washed, I realized the frightened cats had peed on the pile of laundry..I was relieved that I had Nature's Miracle right there....I poured it over the quilts and let it sit overnight for the enzymes to work....Threw it into the washing machine and .....Perfect results! Clean and fresh and no more "accidents!" but if it does happen again, I always have Nature's Miracle on hand! My house will NEVER smell like the cat pan....
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: It REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Really works! I was pleasantly surprised! I didn't think there was anything that could stop my cat from "Spraying", when he got in one of his "attitudes"; but this DID...with 1 use! I spray the areas a second time, just to "enhance". I haven't had to have him do anymore "attitude" checks. YAAAAY!!!✌🏾
customer_reviews.author: Dresden1907

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE. DOES NOT WORK!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyers Beware Do Not Waste Your Money!! I have a poodle that keeps urinating in the same place on my tile. I spray Nature Miracle no more marking over and over again. My dog just keeps peeing over where I sprayed. Try a number of times. It did not stop him. I tried Vinegar and water worked much better. Stopped urinating on that area anymore. Judy M.
customer_reviews.author: Judy McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Won't Purchase Again.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that this is really working. We purchased this, because we like the Nature's Miracle products and have had success with them, so we thought we'd give this a try. I don't know that it's really keeping our pets from marking. We won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Worked only one day. Smells nice and gets rid of urin smells
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed all areas my dog would normally mark and it seems to work but the next day he went back to his ways marking again. It might be that I would need to spray the spot and clean with water hose and then reapply spay? Will give better rating if it works after this. I will say this stuff smells pretty good and seems to get rid of urine smells.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Marking is different form urinating!
customer_reviews.text: I have intact male puppy - a dedicated MARKER. This product is FABULOUS! Too bad it is getting hard to find. I saw some negative reviews, and it is not a miracle dog trainer, it's an enzyme. And it's a good one. If this product doesn't work for you, you need to read up on house training. I even use in on fabric b4 putting in washer.
customer_reviews.author: Zeni

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: I have several cats that have seemed lately to Mark in my room. I bought this product on the reviews alone and I'm sadly regretting it. It does not do what the product says it does. I will never purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rigby

customer_reviews.title: Yes, still marking.
customer_reviews.text: Does it smell good? yea. It just smells like an essential oil lady's house Does it remove urine stains immediately? Absofreakinglutely! Does my dog still mark on the area rug corners and on my curtains anytime I'm not looking? Also absofreakinglutely! The smell is pleasant and i am very happy i don't have to deal with unsightly urine stains but i am just going to have to deal with his incessant need to piss on my curtains and rug.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Gill

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this today for the first time for puppy accidents! He is only 10!weeks old. Since I used it on areas he has has accidents he has only gone on his piddle pads! I must say I’m impressed! I will definitely tell my friends about it! UPDATE::: I was out of Natures Miracle! I tried another product with great reviews!!! BIG MISTAKE!!! My puppy started marking everywhere!!! I got online and paid the additional shipping to get the gallon of Natures Miracle No Mark!!! Sprayed my entire living area, AND NO MORE MARKING!!! I kid you not, this product WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl McMillan

customer_reviews.title: No marking/Use daily
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on this product and all I can say is that people may not use be using it properly. Such as on a rug or an item that has been doggie soiled and not properly clean or disinfected. I purchased new rugs for in and outdoor and I spray them daily. I can honestly say that this item works. In conjunction I use potty here on the grass or area turf where I need them to go.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: While taking care of our daughter's dog while she moved, we found ourselves dealing with a non-longer house broken dog. In addition, our own male dog decided he needed to start marking in the garage to show he's the boss. I bought a gallon, thinking I had a big problem. This stuff worked immediately and I used less than a cup.
customer_reviews.author: Button Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great spray for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to find this product, as my newly rescued Pitbull is having some bathroom issues. Unfortunately, I do not feel this product has made any difference. My cats have their own little corner with a cat tree and what not, which the dog loves to poop and pee all over. I have used this multiple times and not seen much of a difference. It does a great job as a carpet cleaner but not as a anti marking spray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of Nature's Wonderful Miracles
customer_reviews.text: My cats love to pee on anything you leave on the floor. Bags, blankets, etc. all become their little personal toilets. This is easy enough to deal with by not being a complete mess. Then you get a Christmas Tree with a tree skirt. I've seen their little eyes on that thing. They are locked in on it. They are waiting for their moment. So I bought this stuff and it seems to be doing the trick. I'm not through the season yet so I'll withhold that fifth star until then. Oh - and it smells very nice - I may use this as my personal scent if all else fails.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped the dogs from peeing
customer_reviews.text: We didn't use this as an odor eliminator so I can't speak to that, but we used it stop 3 dogs from peeing on the outside stairs. We sprayed it once or twice a day because it was outside and the dogs were from different apartments going outside at different times, but after a couple weeks of continuous use they stopped peeing on the stairs. You have to use it continuously at first if trying to stop marking. When we were only using it here and there the dogs would go back once the smell wore off, and once one dog went back the other 2 followed.
customer_reviews.author: Linnea Marie

customer_reviews.title: use this for my cat
customer_reviews.text: As cats get older, their scent becomes stronger. there is no need to buy different litter, a different box, no need for baking soda sprinkled in the box because this works really well. I used to use cat litter but different brands would smell up the kitchen area. So I switched to horse stall bedding pellets. You can get 40#s of it for $6 and it will last for 3-4 months. but the bags are too heavy for me now, so I use pine shavings. same cost only lighter weight. both will help keep the smell down but this spray is to remind kitty where not to go.
customer_reviews.author: theresa b

customer_reviews.title: Actually works, I was very surprised.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works! I have bought many more now. It doesn't always help for some reason so I am not giving it 5 stars but its the best for now and I am very grateful. I've tried everything. My dog marks when anyone walks past our house or if the other dog is getting too much attention. She is insecure so pees. But not out of anger just fear. I had to set up a wildlife camera to find out who was always marking and caught the suspect. This spray doesn't smell bad either. It has cinnamon in it, how can it?
customer_reviews.author: Carlottia

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I wish I didn't need this but since the addition of a puppy to our house 10 months ago, I've gone through several bottles of this, so I decided to order the large one and refill my spray bottle. It works well for me. It smells nice and takes away the odor. Let me say that I have mostly hardwoods (and I use it on them) so when there is an accident it's usually on an area rug, not thick carpet. But this is a staple for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Ruffin Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work.I have a husky and have used the entire bottle but found it does not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Noblin

customer_reviews.title: I’d never buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. I’ve got a big male (fixed) cat that is obsessed with peeing on the fridge and recliners! We have continuously sprayed this product and it does NOT stop him from marking those items. He did decide to add the new tv stand to his list of “places to pee to piss mom off”. I think I’d be better off with a squirt bottle of water and keeping a close eye on him and giving him a squirt when I catch him. I’d def not recommended this product. May as well just spray the areas they pee on with water cause this does nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was a bit hesitant about purchasing this product that I left it in my cart, debating whether to buy it or not. I read a mixture of reviews on how it worked for some and others not. So I decided to take a chance and see if it worked for me. Fortunately, so far, it has helped, my dog kept marking on one area, so I sprayed it and since I sprayed he has not marked. I went so far as spraying every baseboard throughout my house and have been pleased to not find any surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: What *did* work though, was cleaning up the spot of the accident, then feeding my dog right where he peed. Apparently dogs don't like to eat where they sh*t (you know the saying). Seems it's true! This stuff didn't do much for us though unfortunately. Better off not paying the extra money; just get your normal clean-up spray...
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to even slow down marking
customer_reviews.text: I do some dog sitting, and it seems like most of the male dogs like to mark these patio chairs we keep in the sun room. We hoped that giving the chairs a good clean up with this stuff would help, but it doesn't. We've now just finished the bottle, and I can say with confidence this doesn't do a damn thing to help. We've sprayed again and again, and if I could say "well it stops them for a few days" at least, I could see giving this a couple of stars. But it doesn't. It's useless!
customer_reviews.author: Adalberto N. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Junk, does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: While the scent is nice, don't bother buying as this is wasted money. Does not work at all for getting a dog not to pee on something. Used it as described and dogs now love the smell and pee even more on the area used to not mark. It's like someone at a the company is laughing selling this junk and knowing the dogs will actually want to pee more wherever you use this stuff. Stay away from this, you are only wasting your money. I still haven't found anything that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Arellano

customer_reviews.title: but this one seems to work best.
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. I have a small dog who was "marking" in the house. I tried a lot of products, but this one seems to work best.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Talley

customer_reviews.title: Best pet odor & spot remover on the market! Great price on amazon!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best odor and spot remover on the market! We have always had multiple dogs at a time and have dealt with many accidents. Over the years we tried so many different cleaners that claimed to be the best, but nothing ever worked well until we tried natures miracle! This removes all stains & odors! We have stuck with this product for several years now & recommend it to anyone with a pet! Amazon also has the best price on this product, it is much more expensive in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Peraza

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: Poms kept peeing all over my rug so I used this to clean the stain and used again to cover it. It works well to mask odors but the dogs just keep coming back even though theres a pad 10 feet away. Directions say not to spray on the dog but im seriously considering it.
customer_reviews.author: daviddiy

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great, but repellent didn't do much
customer_reviews.text: Stain and odor remover part works great, like all Natures Miracle products do in my experience, but the repellent oils didn't do much. Will probably stick with the less expensive, non-repellent products.
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my dogs from destroying my new rugs
customer_reviews.text: About 6 months ago I purchased 2 new shag rugs to replace some old destroyed rugs. I also have 2 dogs who lacked the common decency not to pee on them. So instead of just giving up and deciding not to just throw another $1000 down the drain in another six months I decided I’d try this. Amazingly it seems to work. I cleaned the area then treated it heavily with the no mark. I also mist/spray the entire area of the rugs once a week. That being said - the rugs I’ve treated weekly with this stuff have not been peed on since. Smells pretty nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S.

customer_reviews.title: Optimistically pleased
customer_reviews.text: Optimistically pleased with this product. My dog used to mark in the same spot. I cleaned the area very well and SOAKED it in this stuff and spritzed it all over the furniture and he has not marked again. So, unless it was a fluke, it works wonders for me and I will buy more when my small bottle runs out. It also smells very good and seems to have a lasting smell so I was super pleased! :)
customer_reviews.author: Abigail.M

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: It really keeps my little dog from marking . I reapply weekly. The smell isn’t unpleasant unless you use too much. It really neutralizes the pee smell off surfaces including carpet and you can see the stain disappear in seconds with little to no scrubbing. I would welcome a fresher scent. I highly recommend this product. I have it on subscription because before this my house inevitably would start smelling of dog pee. Not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Maryland mom

customer_reviews.title: Finally a NM product that works 100% as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is incredible! No fake NM stink and it really does the job eliminating leftover scent from an area and sending the message of “not here: over there” to a dog in training. Only down side is that it does seem to bleach carpet a few shades in the process of eliminating marks if that’s an issue for you.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: This stuff seriously keeps them from going to the same ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff seriously keeps them from going to the same place again. I have been using it for puppy training and he avoids the spots I treat as though they were fenced off. I was skeptical at first, but I believe in this stuff now.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For Us
customer_reviews.text: The product doesnt have a harsh odor so its ok for humans if anything to wipe down and not have a chemical smell around the house but my Frenchie is not at all deterred by this product which was the intended purpose. Have sprayed it everywhere he has gone and I feel like he is more emboldened to go in the same spot again. I wanted it to work and I waited to do my review for a while after the purchase to give me time to work with the product. Might work for other dog breeds but did not work out at all for us.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Pujol

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Works as expected. Wish it would last longer, but it is rather humid here these days. I need to treat about every 3rd day
customer_reviews.author: J. Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: Has my dog gone back to the same area? Yes. Does my house smell like a dog has had accidents in it? No. So I'm happy. The main thing is I don't want people walking in my house thinking..."yep she has a dog".
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because my cat was peeing on the bathroom floor. It was just so frustrating because she would do it right next her litter box. I can't say whether the spray worked. But it does provide a temporary solution. The smell is nice! Lemongrass and cinnamon. I think once the scent goes away, my cat would be at it again. But this product doesn't break the bank, if I spray it once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K.

customer_reviews.title: He still pissed on the dog house
customer_reviews.text: Strong smell, but not a deterrent for the husky. Smells like fresh cut grass almost Smh.. a few minutes after cleaning and spraying the dog house, the other one lifted his leg and pissed on it. Lol...not buying this again
customer_reviews.author: Saints58

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well but doesn’t stop marking
customer_reviews.text: The product did clean quite well and it smelled ok, which was nice. It was advertised to stop marking and it definitely did not prevent my dog from continuing to mark. Honestly it was a long shot, I don’t think anything will stop my dog from marking. I did use the entire bottle due to the fact that It did a good job cleaning, and I may even buy it again for that reason. D
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: I am Glad I ordered this product !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought " Natures Miracle No More Marking Stain And Odor Removal " because my 11.5 year mixed breed male dog started to do his business in the dining room . I was puzzled . I tried some things that did not work to treat the area . I saturated the spot and let it air dry . No more accidents !!! So far , so good . If it happens again I will retreat the area. A gallon goes a long way !
customer_reviews.author: Fazeworld

customer_reviews.title: Great on Smell and Stains, but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice smell, really really good on stains, but if you believe this will repel or dissuade your pet from not pooping or peeing on your favorite rug I have a one way ticket to Fantasy Island I’m selling at a discount. Snarkiness aside, I really haven’t had anything that works as great in stains and getting rid of odor that works as well as this. It IS worth the price, but don’t kid yourself that it works as a repellant.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Richards

customer_reviews.title: May not be useful on a solid surface.
customer_reviews.text: Smells decent, but doesn't seem to deter our puppy from wetting in the same area. This is on a solid surface tile floor, and nowhere near the grout lines, so we are a little doubtful of the efficacy of the no more marking statement. That being said, it may work well on a floor that can absorb and retain the agents that prevent the marking.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: My male was marking stuff but this didn’t stop it. I used it double time but still didn’t work. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes that this product would work a bit better than any other cleaner (windex, fantastic, etc.) Did not notice one bit of difference. Sprayed down entire area, dried thoroughly and the puppy went right back to the same spot to do his business. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Daily use is a must but great results
customer_reviews.text: I have been helping take care of 7 adult & juvenile yorkies. Cleanup has been a never ending battle even with excellent cleaning machines & products. I started spraying the main living area of the house each morning. The difference was remarkable! The scent is nice as well. My only regret is it has no effect when there is a dog in heat in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Judy R

customer_reviews.title: Don't.
customer_reviews.text: Seems my pups have taken your product as a "challenge" They can not pee enough in any place I have used your product, to your specifications. Even moments after spending 10 mins outside with them, after marking several spots each, outside, they still have enough within them to give a squirt or two inside. I have mopped my floors, cleaned every accident with your product... In conclusion, if you want to have dog piss smell throughout your home, spray this everywhere first, for best coverage.
customer_reviews.author: colleen nadas

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this product. My carpet has a faded color in every spot I sprayed it. My dogs continue to go back to the same spot and pee again. It doesn't work the way it says. I recommend Rocco and Roxie stain and odor eliminator. Better reviews and better product. Don't waste your money on this one. It doesn't work. Plain and simple
customer_reviews.author: STACY

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me...
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, cleans well, doesn't stop my dog from peeing in the same spot however. Didn't work for me, but I have Jack Russell Terriers... they are real special, ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A CAT MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this is any different than the odor eliminator, but I always follow up with this when my cats spray. If I spray an area I don't have any repeat offenses in that area! I love it! We have used this like the other Nature's Miracle products on carpet, furniture, and wall paint and have never had any fading or deterioration of material. We always keep this on hand for messes.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Cervenak

customer_reviews.title: The perfect product to eliminate smells!
customer_reviews.text: This works amazingly well. Not only for spot cleaning. I use large 48 x 62 washable pee pads in my yorkies playpen. I add some of this to the washer along with the detergent. I can say there is absolutely no potty smell after washing! I also spray this directly on the belly bands before washing. They have no urine smell at all. I always have this on hand.
customer_reviews.author: KATH DIAN

customer_reviews.title: Damn Cat pissing in the bathtub
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats is pissing in the bathtub. I use this to get the odor out. Works like a charm. He is still pissing in the bathtub, but the frequency has definitely gone down since using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chang

customer_reviews.title: I had high hopes...
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped it would help deter my cats from peeing on the floors of my bathroom. I cleaned the litter box, sprayed the areas of bathroom where they won't stop peeing, with high hopes. Unfortunately it didn't work. 😔 I dont know what else to try. It does have a better smell to it than most chemicals ive tried. Ill give it that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a fresh, spicy odor, that doesn’t overcome you.  Works amazingly!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! I have gone through many products that say theirs is the best, but they weren’t! This is the best, I promise!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: Our new cat, adopted, was "going" beside the litterbox. Three days of cleaning up and spraying Nature's Miracle put an end to that! At last, something that does what it is supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Have a piddling puppy? This spray is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Spray over the marking area, let it sit for a couple minutes, lightly dab with paper towel and pee, marking, and smell be gone. Great on couches as well. This spray has saved carpets and couches galore.
customer_reviews.author: Emily North

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I love the Natures miracle pet marking spray. it works! Our boy dog Blue has not marked in the house since I have been spraying this product. Will buy more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Kelley

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I dont write reviews. But I am impressed so far. My female cocker spaniel would pee on the kitchen floor every day several times if she was let loose. To the point I didnt know if I could keep her inside. Always the same spots. Nothing worked. I tried this and it worked! I spray lightly over the spots she would go and voila! no peeing. I cant really smell it at all. It doesnt leave a residue on the floor at all. Im amazed. But it is only 2 days so we will see. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: gayle savka

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, this does not work. I used the whole big bottle until it ran out and I never noticed a difference. I followed all the isntructions but it didn't work. It's just an expensive cleaner. I used it to clean up around the house where my dog had a potty accident but it did not help keep him away from those spots. Sometimes he would go in the spot minutes after I was done cleaning. Waste of money. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jr

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Gotta follow the written instructions on the bottle in order to get the best results!!! We are using this thanks to 2 of our male cats fighting for dominance. We are gonna be getting them fixed, however this spray has been a life saver as far as them not having a spray battle of their own!!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work for me. My dog has a habit of peeing in the garage at night. I cleaned the floor with bleach and pee eliminator and then sprayed this spray after it dryers and it didn’t work. I tried it a few times and the bottle is almost gone and it hasn’t helped at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G

customer_reviews.title: “Oops” spots readily removed
customer_reviews.text: German Shorthaired Pointer puppy..., oh my! I like this cleaner better than any other I’ve used. Fresh scent. “Oops” spots were readily removed.
customer_reviews.author: W Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great product for eliminating odor!
customer_reviews.text: I have used other Nature's Miracle products with mixed results. This one however is worth crowing about! I had both old and fresh urine stains on a living room rug from my dog. I tried several products but I could not get rid of the odor. I tried this one a few days and so far, it seems the odor is gone. Now I am working on the stain...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried using this on my truck wheels as some people ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried using this on my truck wheels as some people think it’s ok to let their dogs pee on my wheels, but it seems to have no effect at all. I cleaned the tires and wheels with bleach cleaner then I sprayed the wheels, tires, and about a one foot radius all around each tire! They still pee on em. Might as well be water.
customer_reviews.author: Steph b

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I have a young, intact, male dog, that was hiking his leg up on everything. I read some reviews, did some research, and this was supposed to be the best of the best. Sadly, it isn’t. I cleaned my carpet with the same brand of carpet cleaner, and then sprayed this. Not 24 hours later and I catch him hiking his leg where I had sprayed. The smell is pleasant. That was about the only true statement I read.
customer_reviews.author: J Zieger

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me unfortunately. We have a very determined male Yorkie. Used the spray according to the instruction, didn't faze him a bit. He thinks it smells great! Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Harper Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product- Best one I have used
customer_reviews.text: We have used a bunch of different carpet cleaners as our dog has a sensitive stomach. This cleaner was able to take yellow bile out of my brand new carpet (I almost cried). We have used multiple other cleaners and this one by far is worth the extra couple bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Mack

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs and one is new marking back-and-forth in the house. I tried this for a month and none of it worked or still marking everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This works well with our two yorkies. Sure keeps them using designated areas with training pads.
customer_reviews.author: Maqsood Faquir

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this nature's miracle no marking solution did not work for my shih tzu. I bought a gallon of it, so I pretty much wasted my money. I would not recommend this to anyone who's dog is marking up your house. I ended up getting some repellent spray from PetSmart and that has worked wonders for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Works on most cats/situations.
customer_reviews.text: It helps. I recommend buying the detergent, too. This worked on my friends cats and my sister’s cat. I happened to have a real a-hole of a kitty (outdoor rescue kitty who’s recently gotten very territorial since our newborn came home). So, it didn’t work on this cat. But he is pretty feral, so I don’t blame the product.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Grace

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a deterrent for marking but not great
customer_reviews.text: Okay this product seems legit and yes it does have a lemongrass and cinnamon scent that is supposed to deter marking. It helps neighborhood dogs from coming over but it doesn't stop all of it. I've seen a 75% reduction in marking incidents which definitely makes it a solid buy. I hope they work on the deterrent aspect a little more to help keep marking dogs away. Still I'd recommend this to someone who has dogs marking around their house.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: This really does work!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is good stuff. Takes the smell right out of things. In my case, my dog stopped marking immediately. He's from the country so we had to introduce him to the ways of a city dog. No peeing in the house for my boy!
customer_reviews.author: Fstory

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: Our little doggie started marking, and the problem was getting worse and worse. He was 'pissing' in the house everywhere! We didn't know what to do...Nature's Miracle to the rescue. As soon as we sprayed the spots he kept going back to - magically the problem disappeared. He hasn't marked in the house once since we got this product. Outside on the deck - we're still working on that one! Inside - no more problem.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Kulp

customer_reviews.title: It works, just not for my need.
customer_reviews.text: So this definitely may work if I had known and could have determined where my cat had been marking his territory. However I could not distinguish where he had marked, I could just smeel it Everytime I walked into my apartment. It detered him, but only the day that I had applied it, and to cover my whole apartment, I went through the whole bottle in 4-5 days. So the next purchase I made was for the advanced version of this product and that worked much better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great for odor but doesn’t discourage peeing
customer_reviews.text: This is basically just nature’s miracle for dog urine with a different label. Does nothing to discourage my PTSD rescue chihuahua from peeing. It does help with the odor just as well as the regular Nature’s Miracle spray and usually costs around 25% less.
customer_reviews.author: RecoverInBeautyTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on it was not worth the money it didn't clean or smell good at all.Found a great product at Sam's for $8 that works great on pet stains and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Once Smell Fades, Dog Back At Spot
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work initially when I spray to keep my Chihauhau from remarking on the same carpet spots, but once the smell fades she is back at old habits. She only piddles if there is carpet-on wood surfaces she will use a piddle pad no problem so I was hoping in my carpet-based apartment this would solve the issue. No such luck-it's a transient solve.
customer_reviews.author: Proper Bostonian

customer_reviews.title: MIght as well use water.
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work at all. I might as well as been spraying water. My little dogs pee on the floor. I clean the spots with this and the pee on those same spots to get rid of the smell of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tombstone Luke

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work. Our dog still pees in the areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loved to mark on our outdoor rug so much, you couldn’t open a window because it would waft in. Sprayed this, very nice smell almost like a nutmeg citrus scent. She would not mark or go #2 on the rug. Had to reapply after rains. Finally got rid of the rug, holding onto the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, tried it and not satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for awhile trying it out. I dont feel it works especially the "wont return amd mark same spot when using this" plus, my last one shipped leaked all over the box and such. Going to shop around for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Amber mckee

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I have a new German Shepard puppy that likes to dig in our neighbor's garden this has helped keep her out. I do have to spray it everyday but I figure at some point so will figure it out and move on.
customer_reviews.author: JujuV

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS AND REMOVED STAINS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So we got a new dog. And her and my older dog were having “territory” issues. The shipping was fast and after 2 uses they had completely stopped. However- I was half asleep when going to remove stains from my carpet and grabbed this instead of our stain remover....and MAN IT REMOVED EVERY STAIN I SPRAYED!!!!! Just went back and bought 6 more bottles because you can never have enough quality stain remover when you have a 7 year old and 2 dogs
customer_reviews.author: Abbiey

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work at all
customer_reviews.text: I've replaced my carpet, and put down pee pads. Sprayed the new carpet, sprayed the pee pads, and he marked in the same spot again every day since then. I've saturated the carpet and the pee pads with this stuff. It made 0% difference. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M. Seelbaugh

customer_reviews.title: No more making
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking everywhere in the local stores and nothing... but finally got it... this product works good. Just spray to clean and lighty spray again to maintain the scent.... they won't pee there no more
customer_reviews.author: NadyaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Really Helped!
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a brand new house. I have two dogs and one of them is having trouble adjusting. She’s been peeing on our brand new carpet! I bought this and it really seems to have helped deter her from doing it. This wasn’t in the directions but I mixed equal parts of this and febreeze carpet cleaner in our carpet cleaning device. Then ran it per usual. I think it helped get the solution deeper into the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: William Holt

customer_reviews.title: It works well for 1 day
customer_reviews.text: I use this for the marking habits of my dogs. I sprayed it against all the furnitures they like to pee on. It worked fine for day 1, but day 2 I woke up and the house was a pee fest again.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it keeps my new pup from completely avoiding a certain spot, but overall I do think it works from deterring him. The smell is very nice, not what you would expect. It’s easy to use, and worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BSG

customer_reviews.title: No marking on rug
customer_reviews.text: We have a male dog who got fixed very late in his life and he pees on "new" things or things that have been moved from time to time. He has not wet on our new rug downstairs. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have three dachshunds, two males and one female. One of them were peeing constantly on my beautiful area rug. I used this a few times and scrubbed it into the rug. Since then I haven’t found any pee, knock on wood.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was not effective at all as a deterrent to keep my male aussie from marking. It was more of a marker for him to mark the spots I sprayed. Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Not at all effective
customer_reviews.text: We've tried this to deter one of our cats from marking a particular spot and it has had zero deterrent effect. I've thoroughly cleaned the area with a heavy duty carpet cleaner, allowed to dry and liberally sprayed this product several times but it doesn't deter the cat. I've tried working into the carpet with a brush, I've tried adding it to the carpet cleaning solution and then reapplying but it has never worked for us. The smell isn't unpleasant but so far, it's been totally ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nature's Miracle No More Marking Stain & Odor Remover
product_meta.description:
Size:24-OunceNature’s Miracle pet stain and odor removers have been a trusted brand for pet mess cleanup for more than 35 years. Whatever pets do, you can trust Nature’s Miracle stain and odor removers, training aids, disinfectants and litter products to undo.

This pet stain and odor remover with the naturally repellent scent helps prevent pets from revisiting and marking the same spot twice. When sprayed on previously marked areas, Nature’s Miracle No More Marking™ works to eliminate stains and odors leaving behind lemongrass and cinnamon scents. These scents repel and help prevent dogs from returning to the area. Ideal to use when trying to break dogs’ marking habits, this product will repel dogs while working to eliminate tough, deep-set urine stains and odors. This product comes in both a 24 fl oz spray and a 128 fl oz pour. This product is safe to use around pets and home, when used as directed.

We recommend using Nature’s Miracle No More Marking in conjunction with training, such as praising your pet when positive behavior is exhibited. Make sure to thoroughly soak previously stained areas with this product. Wait five minutes then pat down the area with a cloth. If you are struggling with a pet that repetitively marks the same area, a second application may be needed. 



AMAZON.COM


THE NATURE'S MIRACLE STORY
Behind the Nature’s Miracle formula is a family that loves their pets. In 1981, the Original Nature’s Miracle product (intended for use in preschools), was used by founder Joe Weiss to clean-up a pet accident. To his surprise, the formula worked quickly to remove the stain and the odor. Pleased with the success, Joe produced 24 bottles of Nature’s Miracle “Pet Mess Easy Clean-up.” The new cleaner sold out in 48 hours! Pet owners discovered that the formula was incredibly effective at removing their pet’s stubborn stains and odors, and Nature’s Miracle Stain and Odor Remover was born. Today, Nature’s Miracle remains one of the top pet-mess cleanup solutions for pet owners everywhere.

Nature's Miracle Stain & Odor Remover is effective in fighting ALL organic stains, including the ones made by your pet. HOW IT WORKS
Nature’s Miracle No More Marking Stain and Odor Remover is the best choice for pet owners looking to remove stains and odors as well as prevent future instances of marking or re-soiling. Pets often mark or have accidents in areas that they have visited in the past due to lingering odors, residues, and habit. The No More Marking formula helps to prevent this type of behavior in your pet by combining stain and odor-removing technology with pet-safe repellents. While these repellents keep your pet safely away, Nature’s Miracle No More Marking Stain and Odor Remover works to remove stains and odors such as grass, urine, vomit, blood, and other organic materials. The No More Marking formula may be used on carpets, hard surfaces, fabric, clothing, kennels, and carriers for stains and odors caused by dogs and other pets.

WHEN TO USE NATURE'S MIRACLE STAIN AND ODOR REMOVER
Material Safe to Use Unsafe to Use Carpet ✓ Floors ✓ Wood Floors ✓ Cloth Furniture ✓ Leather ✓ Suede ✓ Clothing ✓ Cages ✓ Litter Boxes ✓ Pet Living and Sleeping Areas ✓ DIRECTIONS FOR USE
As with all Nature's Miracle products, it is essential that you follow the directions when using Nature's Miracle Stain & Odor Remover to guarantee the best results.

STAIN REMOVAL:
 * Wipe away any excess stain-causing material, then soak the surface thoroughly with Nature’s Miracle No More Marking Stain and Odor Remover.
 * Wait five minutes, then wipe away stain with a cloth. For tough stains, use a stiff, bristle brush.
 * If the stain is not completely removed, re-soak area and allow to work for one hour before wiping with a cloth.

ODOR ELIMINATION:
 * Thoroughly soak the entire area with Nature’s Miracle No More Marking Stain and Odor Remover. For carpets, apply enough to reach the urine penetration in the pad and floor. This may mean lifting the carpet and applying directly to the pad and floor.
 * Allow the product to air dry. Depending on air circulation, carpets and upholstery may take up to two weeks to dry completely.
 * If after two weeks there is still an odor, Nature’s Miracle No More Marking Stain and Odor Remover has not reached ALL of the odor-causing material. Pinpoint odor source and repeat cleaning process.
 * Keep the product away from children and pets and do not allow pets onto the treated area until it has completely dried.

LAUNDRY:
Saturate areas of fabric affected by stain and odor with full strength Nature’s Miracle No More Marking Stain and Odor Remover then wash as usual.

CHOOSING THE PRODUCT THAT IS RIGHT FOR YOU
Nature’s Miracle is committed to continually improving formulas and creating new products to better serve pet owners. From a line of stain and odor removers entirely for cats, to those made specifically for hard surfaces, Nature’s Miracle has a formula perfect for your pet-mess needs. Check out the chart below to see which Nature’s Miracle formula might be right for you.

Nature’s Miracle Stain & Odor Remover Our original formula, perfect for common pet messes. Nature’s Miracle Urine Destroyer Works to remove stains and odors related to urine. Nature’s Miracle Laundry Additive Helps to remove stains and odors from clothes, bedding, and other washable materials…simply add to your wash. Nature’s Miracle Carpet Shampoo Formulated to work with carpet-cleaning machines and steamers. Nature’s Miracle Skunk Odor Remover Works quickly to get skunk-smell out of your pet’s fur, bedding, clothes, and more.
feature_bullets: Quality and performance driven products for your pet
Provide a better quality of living for your pet with United Pet Group
